title: 1953 Cheverolet One Fifty
description: This cute 2 door car has a roomy interior and seats 6! This ride is powered by a 3.5-liter inline-six engine that produces 115 horsepower and 205 lb-ft of torque. It is paired with a three-speed manual transmission and rear-wheel drive.

title: 1967 Cadillac Coupe deVille
description: powerful, stylish, and luxurious car that embodies the spirit of American muscle cars. Seat 6 in its roomy interior. THe engine is a 429 cubic inch V8 producing 340 horsepower and 480 lb-ft of torque. Its paired with a three-speed automatic transmission.

title: 1964 Ford Mustang
description: This is the first year the ford mustang debuted. It contains a 289 cubic inch V8 and produces up to 271 horsepower. It became an iconic American muscle car

title: 1972 Jaguar XJ6
description: the 1972 Jaguar XJ6 is a stylish and luxurious sedan that offers a combination of performance, comfort, and refinement. Comfortably seats up to 5

title: 1967 Chevy Corvette
description: Known for its powerful engine, sleek styling, and outstanding performance! This car is equiped with a 327 cubic inch V8 engine and produces 300 horsepower

title: 1941 Ford Model 18
description: This stylish car is known for its smooth ride and comfortable interior. Bench seats accomodate up to 6 people

title: 1973 volkswagen beetle
description: This is the last year of the original beetle design. It is a classic with a cult following

title: 1970 Chevrolet Chevelle SS
description: This ride has a 6.5-liter (396 cubic inch) V8 engine and produces 350 horsepower and 415 lb-ft of torque. It can go from 0 to 60 mph in 6.5 seconds

title: 1958 Chevy Apache
description: The 1958 Chevy Apache is a classic pickup truck as part of the Task Force series of trucks that was introduced by Chevrolet in 1955

title: 1967 Dodge Charger
description: This car has a 426 cubic inch Hemi V8 engine. The Hemi engine is the most powerful option at the time, producing 425 horsepower.
